author: daxian-dbw
body:
Currently, we only run Jenkins build when we are working on a release, so if there are any issues that cause the Jenkins build to fail, we won't know until at release time. We need to set up daily Jenkins build so that issues can be caught early enough.

@TravisEz13 is working on enabling the release build pipeline in VSTS

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Added the schedule.  Will verify tomorrow.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: We have had two scheduled runs with only antivirus signature update failures.

title: We need to have daily release build to make sure the release build pipeline works
